name: Scare Tactics (Ronibw)
description:
Humans have infiltrated your manor like the invasive creatures they are. 

Drive them away before the night ends but be careful.

If they catch you, this will be the last night you live.

[PROGRAMMING]

Daniel Wallace

Mohsen Rahimi

[GAME DESIGN]

Cole Millar

[ART]

Kurt Perez

[NARRATIVE || AUDIO]

Veronica "Roni" Bierwirth
